Headline: #49 Western Temporary Reroute at Western/Harrison
ShortDescription: 49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Harrison, Oakley, Polk and Western: due to, police activity near Western/Harrison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Harrison, Oakley, Polk and Western: due to, police activity near Western/Harrison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Cregier
ShortDescription: #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Jeffrey, 76th, Stony Island, 77th and over regular route, due to street blockage near 79th/Cregier.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Jeffrey, 76th, Stony Island, 77th and over regular route, due to street blockage near 79th/Cregier.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Delays, Limited Service Between Garfield & Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: Green Line service experiencing delays; limited service via train shuttle available btwn Cottage Grove & Garfield

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are experiencing delays. We are working to run as much service as frequently and as evenly as possible.

Currently, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between Harlem/Lake and Ashland/63rd, and,
  • between Garfield station and Cottage Grove, with limited service.

Change trains at Garfield for continuing service between the East 63rd branch and trains running the remainder of the Green Line route between Harlem/Lake, downtown and Ashland/63rd.

See station personnel for further assistance and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running with wait times of up to 30 minutes; we're working to restore service. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running, but with extended wait times. Some riders may experience wait times of up to 30 minutes while our crews work to restore regular service levels.

Use trackers to look for live arrival information and consider available alternatives, such a local bus routes or buses to/from other 'L' lines.

Allow extra travel time.
